column4: To anybody who can help me out... I'm a totally new user in linux and Ubuntu doesn't work with my soundcard. Can anybody tell me how to fix it?
can you do this in a terminal lspci | grep Multimedia and post the output
0000:00:1f.5 Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corporation 82801CA/CAM AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 01)
0000:00:1f.5 Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corporation 82801CA/CAM AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 01)
at a terminal type sudo modprobe intel-8x0 and if it loads ok add intel-8x0 to /etc/modules
after doing that reboot and see if you have sound
this is what it came up with         FATAL: Module intel_8x not found.
so, how do I add that command to the modules folder?
it sohuld of been sudo modprobe snd-intel8x0
i did that and the command went through
if it loads add snd-intel8x0 to your /etc/modules file and see how it goes after a reboot
